abstract: Two separate but related reports found that the company’s journalists had access to information about clients through a number of channels that those clients did not know about.
snippet: Two separate but related reports found that the company’s journalists had access to information about clients through a number of channels that those clients did not know about.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 8:10 p.m. | Bloomberg L.P. said on Wednesday that it was making several changes to its journalism operation after an investigation commissioned by the company detailed problems with the past use of client data.

headline.main: Bloomberg to Increase Oversight After Privacy Lapses
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg to Increase Oversight After Privacy Lapses
